title: Step 20

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: You should add a display of flex to the background-buildings class.
You should add an align-items of flex-end to the background-buildings class.
You should add a justify-content of space-evenly to the background-buildings class.

description: The buildings are currently stacked on top of each other. Align the buildings by turning the .background-buildings element into a flexbox parent. Use the align-items and justify-content properties to evenly space the buildings across the bottom of the element.
